ComicInfo.Series: Chaos Campus: Sorority Girls vs. Zombies
ComicInfo.Summary:
Dead Man on Campus, Part 2 of 2- The conclusion to the full color series origin! The sorority survivors split into three groups to cover more ground for help forcing Paige, Brittany, and Jamie into a group. The trio are still getting used to each other's quirks and might kill each other before the zombies do!
